title: Thomas Wells
text:
Hi, I’m Thomas!
I’m an independent consultant based in Fruita. My main work at Dynamodal involves supporting utilities and energy companies with efficiency and data analysis projects. I enjoy that work, and I also wanted to do something to support my local community, so I started Fruita Tech Wizard to provide friendly, personalized tech support for local residents and small businesses.
I’ve always been the go-to tech person for my family, friends, and coworkers, and I enjoy helping people solve tech problems. Whether it’s fixing a slow computer, resolving errors after a Windows upgrade, setting up a new phone, or optimizing a WiFi network, I’m here to help.
I studied Physics and Electrical Engineering at the Colorado School of Mines. After a few years in the Alaskan oil fields, I moved back to Colorado and began working as a data science consultant.
When I’m not working, I enjoy biking, running, and exploring the trails and rivers around Fruita.

Why FTW?
I picked “FTW” as a fun nod to Fruita’s WTF (Welcome to Fruita) stickers. It also stands for “For The Win,” which is what I aim to help you do with your technology.

title: FTW
text:
Fruita Tech Wizard

Need help with your computer, phone, or home technology? Fruita Tech Wizard, FTW, is here to help.
Based in Fruita, I provide friendly, personalized tech support to local residents and businesses.
I make house calls.






ImportantWindows 10 to 11 upgrade



If you have a Windows 10 computer that is at end-of-life or no longer receiving updates, give me a call before you toss it out. I can often help you get a few more years out of it, or help find a new home for someone who can use it.



What I Do

Computer troubleshooting and repairs
Phone and tablet support
Home WiFi setup and optimization
Smart home device installation
Small business IT services
AI, ChatGPT / LLM training
General tech advice and guidance
Help keep older tech working longer

Check out the services page for more details.






TipAI Training and Consulting



There’s a lot of hype around AI tools like ChatGPT, and the landscape is changing rapidly. I can help you navigate this new world while protecting your privacy and security.
Whether you’re curious about AI for personal use or want to integrate it into your business, I offer hands-on training and practical advice tailored to your needs.




Why Choose FTW?

Local, trusted service
Clear communication
Fair pricing
Free quotes
Decades of experience



Contact
 Call or Text: (720) 213-6374
 Email: help@fruitatechwizard.com
Free quotes - just call, text, or email!
